title: Heroes of urf mode
body:
This season we have a lot of scary characters in urf mode doing come scary things as always

some big offenders here

{{champion:12}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:115}} {{champion:143}} 

using info from this year and last year mostly from personal experience and considering the new changes these are a lot of the particularly overbearing champs.

As you may have noticed, you are not going to win in urf by just doing whatever and mashing buttons unless you pick the right champs for this. But some of us seem to be interested in some sort of skill display and counterplaying these champ

I'd like for you to discuss some of the ideas, patterns, and counterstrats available to the meta these bad guys of the meta (the ones who tyrannize the meta) as well as the heroes of the meta that can counterplay a lot of the nonsense these champs pull

I'll start with some nominations, feel free to ask about them. These champs are partly chosen because not only do they perform well against most of these champs but they are also generally good and feel generally balanced in the mode in general. 

{{champion:103}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:51}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:15}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:22}} {{champion:34}}
